channel.title: 2017-02-12 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-02-12 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 12 Feb 2017 00:00
item.description: 10 miles on the treadmill. Longest distance so far. Not that bad, after all. Looks like I’m getting used to the treadmill much quicker than anticipated. The target was 15 though. Will hopefully play catchup over the next few weeks.
item.content:encoded: 10 miles on the treadmill. Longest distance so far. Not that bad, after all. Looks like I’m getting used to the treadmill much quicker than anticipated. The target was 15 though. Will hopefully play catchup over the next few weeks.
